summary: EXHAUST MANIFOLD BOLTS SHRED OFF CAUSING ENGINE MISFIRE.  LEADING TO A VERY COSTLY REPAIR. MECH. SAID THAT THIS HAPPENS ON ALL THE GM OF A SIMILAR DESIGN,     AT HIGHWAY SPEED DON'T NOTICE THE ROUGHNESS.  WHEN YOU COME TO A STOP AND CAN REALLY FEEL THE CYLINDER MISS FIRING.   FAULT CODE SAID NUMBER WAS MIS-FIRING.  *TR
